title: Basic Usage
content: For details, see the following example.
findIntroStr: The Numeric counter can be used to enter numbers. The value range and step size can be customized. The mouse and keyboard can be added or deleted.

title: Clearable Feature
content: You can use the allow-empty property to set the clearability of counter contents. The default value is false, indicating that the data cannot be cleared.
findIntroStr: The Numeric counter can be used to enter numbers. The value range and step size can be customized. The mouse and keyboard can be added or deleted.

title: Step
content: You can set the step of the counter through the step attribute.
findIntroStr: The Numeric counter can be used to enter numbers. The value range and step size can be customized. The mouse and keyboard can be added or deleted.

title: Numeric loop
content: You can set the maximum value allowed by the counter by setting the max attribute, and set the minimum value allowed by the counter by setting the min attribute. Set the circulate property to start from the minimum value after reaching the maximum value up, or vice versa.
findIntroStr: The Numeric counter can be used to enter numbers. The value range and step size can be customized. The mouse and keyboard can be added or deleted.

title: Dimension
content: You can set the counter size through the size attribute. The value can be medium / small / mini.
findIntroStr: The Numeric counter can be used to enter numbers. The value range and step size can be customized. The mouse and keyboard can be added or deleted.

title: Control Button
content: You can set whether the counter has a control button through the controls attribute.
findIntroStr: The Numeric counter can be used to enter numbers. The value range and step size can be customized. The mouse and keyboard can be added or deleted.

title: Control button display position
content: You can set the position of the control button through the controls-position attribute.
findIntroStr: The Numeric counter can be used to enter numbers. The value range and step size can be customized. The mouse and keyboard can be added or deleted.

title: Associated Text
content: You can set the label text associated with the text box through the label attribute.
findIntroStr: The Numeric counter can be used to enter numbers. The value range and step size can be customized. The mouse and keyboard can be added or deleted.

title: disabled
content: Disable the counter by setting disabled.
findIntroStr: The Numeric counter can be used to enter numbers. The value range and step size can be customized. The mouse and keyboard can be added or deleted.

title: name
content: You can use the name attribute to set the native attribute.
findIntroStr: The Numeric counter can be used to enter numbers. The value range and step size can be customized. The mouse and keyboard can be added or deleted.

title: Numeric precision
content: You can set the precision value of the counter through the precision attribute.
findIntroStr: The Numeric counter can be used to enter numbers. The value range and step size can be customized. The mouse and keyboard can be added or deleted.

title: Mouse wheel scrolling change value
content: You can use the mouseWheel attribute to control whether the scroll wheel can change the value.
findIntroStr: The Numeric counter can be used to enter numbers. The value range and step size can be customized. The mouse and keyboard can be added or deleted.

title: Focus Event
content: The focus event is triggered when the text box is focused.
findIntroStr: The Numeric counter can be used to enter numbers. The value range and step size can be customized. The mouse and keyboard can be added or deleted.

title: Out of Focus Event
content: The blur event is triggered when the text box loses focus.
findIntroStr: The Numeric counter can be used to enter numbers. The value range and step size can be customized. The mouse and keyboard can be added or deleted.

title: Value change event
content: The change event is triggered when the value of the text box is changed.
findIntroStr: The Numeric counter can be used to enter numbers. The value range and step size can be customized. The mouse and keyboard can be added or deleted.

title: The price is automatically calculated based on the product quantity.
content: The price is automatically calculated based on the product quantity.
